title: High level understanding of RWI UI
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?

title: High level understanding of RWI UI
description: we don't use description, I wonder where this shows up?
background: This is a bunch of background information about the question. This will set up the scenario and what you are looking for, and might hint at the question or what they would have to do to answer. Maybe also hint at the level of difficulty for the question.

phrasings.question_phrasing: Which user is logging into the VPN from the city Benicia on 9/18/2020?

hints.hint: Is there a dashboard panel for Global Protect VPN Logins by City?
Did you scroll to the bottom?
